content.raw:
it's related to the package name, since @\_jrivero_ likes to use `libignition-msgs-dev` for both 0 and 1, so the current code is already providing the install and debbuilder jobs

excluding them prevents trying to test `libignition-msgs1-dev`, which doesn't exist
content.html:
it's related to the package name, since @_jrivero_ likes to use libignition-msgs-dev for both 0 and 1, so the current code is already providing the install and debbuilder jobs

excluding them prevents trying to test libignition-msgs1-dev, which doesn't exist
